snippet: Hamas lawmakers on Tuesday approved a 2014 budget totaling $589 million for the Gaza Strip that included a staggering 75 percent deficit.
abstract: Hamas lawmakers approve a 2014 budget totaling $589 million for the Gaza Strip that includes a staggering 75 percent deficit.
lead_paragraph: Hamas lawmakers on Tuesday approved a 2014 budget totaling $589 million for the Gaza Strip that included a staggering 75 percent deficit.

headline.main: Gaza: Hamas Lawmakers Approve Large Budget Deficit
headline.print_headline: Gaza: Hamas Lawmakers Approve Large Budget Deficit
